caption.title: Time series of CMIP5 multi-model-simulated annual mean HT BSO anomaly.
caption.p: Blue solid line: CMIP5 multi-model ensemble mean; light blue shading: spread (±1 s.d.) across multi-model ensemble members; blue dashed line: linear trend. Red dashed line: estimated annual mean HT BSO trend (∼35 TW per 37 years) implied from the observed SIE trend in Fig. 3b.
